author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Pierre Smits for "user in securityPermissionGroup "CONTENT_USER" can't access content application" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5673
When assigning a user to securityPermissionGroup 'CONTENT_USER' this user can't log into the content application.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Pierre Smits for "user in securityPermissionGroup "CONTENT_USER" can't access content application" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5673
